name: Home Alone (itch) (Tom Rivaud)
description:
Too High is a 2D adventure game, it has been made during the Global Game Jam with a team of 4 people. The theme was "What home means to you "
You play as a little boy who needs to fetch items in order to make his home confortable, but beware you can't go too further in the woods, or the boy will be tired and loses all the objects he has collected

Team : 

Game Design : Théo Gautier - Enzo Onesti - Stanislas Vaslin - Tom Rivaud

Level Design & Sound Design : Stanislas Vaslin

Prog : Enzo Onesti - Tom Rivaud

Art : Théo Gautier
